lines.text: I wouldn't want to marry that bitch for real.
There's a few things in life I've learned not to touch. Onions and married men.
Look, if we don't pull this through, I get deported. But you - get a prison sentence and a one hundred thousand franc fine.
For what? Not being in love with my wife? Ha ha. Half the population would be in jail.

[seeing Nick in bed with yet another woman]
Oh my god, another one! You're an AIDS epidemic waiting to happen.
I once dated this method actor who changed personality with each part. Our relationship kind of fell apart when he got cast as Henry VIII.
